properties.entry: SELECT ut.posper_category_id AS parentProsperCategoryId FROM im_strain_units_details ud , im_strain_units ut WHERE ud.im_strain_units_id = ut.id AND ud.id = :unitDetailId AND ud.location_id = :restaurantId;

INSERT INTO im_strain_inventory (`id`, `visibleId`, `units_details_id`, `cost`, `grams`, `user_id` , `im_strain_type_id`, `weigh_tech`, `date`, `ATTR1`, `total_weight`, `bag_weight`, `starting_weight` , `ending_weight`, `loss`, `version`, `location_id`) SELECT :inventoryUUID /*calculated java*/, (SELECT max(visibleId) + 1 FROM im_strain_inventory), :unitDetailId, :cost, :totalWeight, :userId, ty.id, :weighTech, :date, 'ACTIVE', :totalWeight, :bagWeight, :startWeight, :endWeight, :loss, '0', :restaurantId FROM im_strain_type ty , im_strain_tier ti WHERE ty.im_strain_tier_id = ti.id AND ty.posper_category_id = :parentProsperCategoryId /*calculated sql*/;
UPDATE im_strain_units_details SET status = 1, updated_at = now() WHERE id = :unitDetailId;

INSERT INTO im_strain_units_stockdiary (`id`, `posper_category_id`, `reason`, `units`, `datetime`, `reference_table` , `reference_id`, `reference_table2`, `reference_id2`, `location_id`) VALUES (uuid(), :parentProsperCategoryId /*calculated sql*/, '-1', '-1', now(), 'im_strain_units_details', :unitDetailId, 'im_strain_inventory', :inventoryUUID /*calculated java*/, :restaurantId );

SELECT pr.id AS jarProductId /*jarProductId*/ FROM im_strain_type ty, posper_product pr, im_strain_tier ti WHERE pr.category_id = ty.posper_category_id AND ty.im_strain_tier_id = ti.id AND ty.posper_category_id = :parentProsperCategoryId /*calculated sql*/ AND ty.restaurant_id = :restaurantId AND pr.weight = :grams;

INSERT INTO im_strain_detail (`id`, `total_grams`, `grams_per_jar`, `quantity`, `jars_sold`, `total_cost`, `cost_per_gram`, `ATTR1`, `im_strain_inventory_id`, `posper_product_id`, `version`, `restaurant_id`) SELECT :jarDetailsUUID /*java*/, :quantity * pr.weight, pr.weight, :quantity, 0, round(:quantity * pr.weight * :costPerGram, 2), :costPerGram, if(:quantity = 0, 'FINISHED', 'ACTIVE'), :inventoryUUID, :jarProductId, '0', :restaurantId FROM posper_product pr WHERE pr.id = :jarProductId /*sql*/;
UPDATE LOW_PRIORITY posper_product SET units = units + :quantity, inStock = if(units + :quantity > '0', 1, 0), version = version + 1 WHERE id = :jarProductId;

UPDATE LOW_PRIORITY posper_product SET units = units + :shake, inStock = if(units > '0', 1, 0), version = version + 1 WHERE id = :shakeProsperProductMD5id /*java*/;
